locations.name: Starting Glade
locations.description: You stand in a quiet glade surrounded by looming trees. Fog curls along the ground.

locations.name: Forest Path
locations.description: A narrow path winds between mossy trees. You hear distant whispers.

locations.name: Abandoned Shack
locations.description: Rotting wood and cobwebs. Something glints under the floorboards.

locations.name: Foggy Crossroads
locations.description: A misty clearing where paths meet. A locked gate blocks the way north.

locations.name: Old Watchtower
locations.description: A crumbling tower. Too dark to enter without light.

locations.name: Ancient Gate
locations.description: The gate is old and bound with iron. A large lock holds it shut.

items.name: Rusty Lantern
items.description: It's old and dusty, but might still work.

items.name: Small key
items.description: It may be small, but it does the job.

items.name: Tower key
items.description: Oh great. Another pocket. I used to live in a mahogany drawer.
